alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:16PM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very low visibility and near-blizzard conditions due to falling snow and strong westerly winds expected. Snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and wind gusts in excess of 45 mph are expected. * WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions with areas of blowing snow especially in open and rural areas. In addition, gusty winds may bring down tree limbs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
